full_output.summary: An enthusiastic and motivated student with a strong passion for problem-solving and innovation, looking forward to applying my skills and knowledge to real-world challenges. I am committed to continuous learning and excelling in the industry, with a focus on making meaningful contributions and driving positive change.

projects.name: Rakshak Ka Raksha
projects.description: Designed an Android app to enhance watchmen safety by integrating an SOS button that triggers alerts to nearby users via SMS and calls to emergency contacts given by the user. Integrated map view for locating nearby help.

projects.name: Chatbot for Student Queries
projects.description: Designed a user-friendly webpage and integrated a rule-based chatbot. Integrated features for browsing through reference books spanning an entire four-year curriculum.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis Using Twitter Data
projects.description: Conducted data visualization and exploratory data analysis (EDA) to understand the data distribution and key patterns. Achieved accurate analysis and interpretation of emotions and opinions conveyed in textual data.

experiences.description: Designed an approach that opens new ways to create strategies that better match peoples preferences and behaviors using neuromarketing. Research paper about the superiority of ensemble classifier(CNN and LSTM) over current methods in predicting consumer preferences, showcasing improved accuracy and robustness.

full_output.name: Sharini Deepthi Putla
achievements_and_awards: Secured a Silver Medal for the Research Paper Inside Consumer Mind: A Neuromarketing Approach using (CGPA: 9.1/10.00) (Percentage: 96.6) (GPA: 9.8/10.0) EEG Signals presented at the 8th Research Day SRM AP
